name: Academy of Miracles and Mischief
description:
Academy of Miracles and Mischief

A super-fun, light hearted, platform race.

Playable with up to 4 of your friends!

In a duel to the finish line you will race along with your fellow creatures of immortality, traversing magical terrain while finding powerups along the way. 

Will you be angelic and play fair? Or will you be mischievous and use those sneaky powerups to win?


Controls:

Extra Information

The concept for this game was created by an original dev team during a 48hr game jam, the project was then continued and completed by 2 remaining game Devs with the addition of a designer in just 2 weeks!

This game is intended to be accessible via LAN connection for multiplayer or can be played local split-screen.  There are online multiplayer capabilities with an application called Parsec, which will allow you to imitate local split-screen, this does however come with the risk of unguaranteed controller and connection bugs that are out of our control at this late phase of development.  Using both a keyboard and mouse as one player and a gamepad as another player sometimes fixes these issues. 
Reflecting on these issues any future multiplayer games we make we intend to create with dedicated servers for a smoother and easier online multiplayer gameplay experience. 

There are instructions under the Help tab in-game if you are stuck with any connection methods.

Thank you for Playing!
